backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing e-commerce functionality including products with variants, orders, shopping carts, user profiles, reviews, notifications, analytics, and discussion forums with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the frontend useProducts hook addProduct mutation correctly passes authenticated caller identity to the backend actor.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files describing components, pages, and hooks for the Mosslight Studios e-commerce application with admin passcode authentication and product variant support.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives and OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the Mosslight Studios brand palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Mosslight Studios application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (home, products, cart, checkout, admin pages, forum, gallery) wrapped in ThemeProvider, AdminAuthProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied component with shield icon and return-to-home button displayed when users lack permissions.
Add-to-cart component with quantity selector that validates variant selection, checks inventory, and calls useAddItemToCart mutation with productId, quantity, and optional variantId.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Guard component that checks admin authentication status via useAdminAuth hook and renders AccessDeniedScreen if not authenticated, otherwise renders children.
Modal dialog for admin authentication that requires Internet Identity login first, then validates an 8-digit passcode before navigating to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AdminNotificatio: Displays unread admin alerts and low inventory notifications in a card with icons, timestamps, and mark-as-read functionality.
frontend/src/components/AdminReplyForm.t: Form component that allows admin users to post replies to discussion board posts, visible only to users with admin role.
Form for authenticated users to submit questions to the discussion board with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/CustomerMessages: Displays a list of messages sent to customers, showing broadcast announcements and direct messages with timestamps.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionPostLi: Renders a sorted list of discussion posts with status badges, reply counts, and timestamps, linking to individual post detail pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying copyright, social media links, and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/GalleryItem.tsx: Card component displaying social media content with optional media preview, automatically recording analytics view events on mount.
frontend/src/components/GalleryUploadFor: Form for uploading gallery content with text and multiple media files, showing upload progress and converting files to ExternalBlob format.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header component with logo, navigation links (Shop, Gallery, About, FAQ, Forum, My Orders), cart icon with item count, login/logout buttons, notification bell, and admin dashboard access for authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps pages with Header, main content area (Outlet), and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout and displays an admin login modal for non-authenticated users.
Admin form component for composing and sending broadcast messages to all customers with a textarea input and send button.
frontend/src/components/MessageHistory.t: Displays a list of previously sent messages with timestamps, content, and badges indicating broadcast or direct message type.
frontend/src/components/MyOrderCard.tsx: Card component displaying individual order details including order ID, date, status badge, line items with variants, and total price calculation.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: Dropdown notification bell component showing unread notifications with icons, timestamps, and mark-as-read functionality for order updates, low inventory, and general alerts.
frontend/src/components/OrderList.tsx: Admin component displaying filterable list of orders with search functionality, status badges, and inline status update dropdowns for managing order fulfillment.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Badge component that displays order status (pending, shipped, delivered) with appropriate styling variants.
Badge component that displays forum post status (open, answered) with color-coded styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, name, price, rating stars, review count, and out-of-stock badge. Records analytics events on click and links to product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form component for creating or editing products with fields for name, description, price, inventory, images, and optional variants. Handles image uploads with progress tracking and form validation.
frontend/src/components/ProductReviews.t: Displays a list of product reviews with star ratings, verified purchase badges, and timestamps. Shows average rating summary and handles empty state.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Provides search and filter UI for products with text search and price range dropdown. Filters products in real-time and includes a clear filters button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new users to complete their profile with name, email, and shipping address. Prevents dismissal until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/ReplyList.tsx: Displays a chronologically sorted list of admin replies with timestamps and admin badges in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: Form for authenticated users to submit product reviews with star rating selection and text input. Validates purchase history before allowing submission.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaLinks: Renders social media icons (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok) with links to Mosslight Studios profiles.
frontend/src/components/VariantManager.t: React component for managing product variants (size, color, price, inventory) with add, edit, and delete functionality, including form validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: Context provider and hook for admin authentication using a hardcoded passcode, localStorage session management, and backend admin verification via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: React Query hooks for fetching analytics data (clicks, views, revenue, orders, low inventory) and recording analytics events (product clicks, content views, order completions).
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: React Query hooks for cart operations including viewing cart items, adding items, clearing cart, and checkout with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerMessages.t: React Query hook for fetching customer messages associated with the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerOrders.ts: React Query hooks for fetching customer orders, including all orders for the authenticated user and individual order details by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useDiscussionBoard.ts: React Query hooks for discussion board functionality including fetching all posts, individual threads, creating posts, and adding replies with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGallery.ts: React Query hooks for fetching social media content and a placeholder mutation for adding content (not yet implemented in backend).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: React Query hooks for admin message management including fetching all messages and sending messages to specific customers or broadcast.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: React Query hooks for fetching unread notifications and marking individual notifications as read with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: React Query hooks for admin order management including fetching all orders and updating order status with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for product operations including fetching all products, fetching a single product by ID, and adding new products with images. The add product mutation includes extensive logging for debugging authentication and backend communication.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductVariants.ts: React Query hook for fetching product variants by product ID with 30-second stale time caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching product reviews with average ratings and submitting new reviews. Automatically invalidates review queries after successful submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile and role using React Query. Handles actor availability checks and query invalidation on profile updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for Mosslight Studios brand colors in light and dark modes, plus typography settings using Playfair Display and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page with Mosslight Studios' story, mission, and contact information including email and social media links.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAnalyticsPage.ts: Admin-only analytics dashboard showing revenue, order count, product clicks, content views, and low inventory alerts using cards and metrics visualization.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Main admin dashboard with navigation cards to product management, orders, messaging, gallery, forum, and analytics sections, plus an admin notifications panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGalleryPage.tsx: Admin page for uploading and managing gallery/social media content using the GalleryUploadForm component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMessagesPage.tsx: Admin messaging interface with tabs for composing new messages to customers and viewing message history.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Admin page that displays and manages customer orders using the OrderList component, protected by AdminGuard with loading state handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin page for managing products with CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete), displaying products in a grid with edit/delete actions and a ProductForm modal for adding/editing.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with product details and variants, calculates totals, and provides clear cart functionality with navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page requiring authentication that displays user shipping info from profile, accepts payment details via form, and processes order placement with navigation to success page.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Static FAQ page displaying categorized questions and answers about shipping, returns, product care, and ordering using an accordion component.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPage.tsx: Discussion board page showing a list of customer questions with an AskQuestionForm component for submitting new questions.
frontend/src/pages/ForumThreadPage.tsx: Individual forum thread page displaying a question post with its replies and an AdminReplyForm for admins to respond.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Gallery page displaying social media content items in a grid layout with social media links and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component with hero section, feature highlights (curated collection, made with love, unique designs), and call-to-action sections linking to products and gallery.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Authenticated user account page displaying orders and messages in tabs, with profile setup modal for new users and access denied screen for unauthenticated visitors.
frontend/src/pages/OrderSuccessPage.tsx: Order confirmation page showing success message with order ID and navigation buttons to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page with image display, variant selection (size/color), pricing, inventory status, add-to-cart functionality, and product reviews section.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product listing page with search/filter functionality, displaying all products in a responsive grid with loading states and empty state handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme (emerald/nude palette), typography settings, container queries, animations, and shadcn/ui component styling using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking an ecommerce platform for Mosslight Studios with 25 versions, featuring admin dashboard, customer portal, social media gallery, and product management with variants. Currently has a known issue where authenticated admin users cannot add products due to backend permission validation failure.
